mainPage.mainTheme: Caring for your <1>pet</1> in a new way
mainPage.mainText1: VetCard is a unified space for medical records, reminders and smart interaction with your pet.
mainPage.opportunity_text: Everything under control, without unnecessary hassle.
mainPage.opportunity_card1: Complete history of diseases, vaccinations and procedures in one place.
mainPage.opportunity_card2: Smart notifications about appointments, medications and vaccinations.
mainPage.opportunity_card3: Care and nutrition advice based on veterinarian recommendations.
mainPage.mainText2: VetCard for all types of animals
mainPage.mainText3: Our system is suitable not only for pets, but also for farm animals. VetCard helps track health, vaccinations and care for any type of animal - from cats to cattle.

footer.text1: Your digital passport for pet health.

aboutPage.aboutText1: Every pet deserves care and attention. The VetCard app helps pet owners and veterinarians stay connected and track the health of their furry friends.
aboutPage.aboutText2: You will always be aware of vaccinations, doctor visits and medical history. Everything at hand - in one click.

forgotPassword.success: Password successfully changed! Now you can sign in.

support.title: Help Center
support.subtitle: Everything you need to know in one place.

faq.a1: Click the "Register" button on the main page and follow the instructions. You will only need your full name and email.
faq.q2: I am a veterinarian. How do I get access to the doctor profile?
faq.a2: When registering, at step 4, select the "Veterinarian" role. After that, you will be prompted to fill in professional data.
faq.q3: How many pets can I add?
faq.a3: Currently, the number of pets on one account is unlimited. You can create a card for each of your beloved pets.
faq.q4: What to do if I don't know the exact date of birth of the pet?
faq.a4: Enter an approximate date. The main thing is to indicate the year so that the system can correctly track age-related changes and recommend procedures.
faq.a5: Yes. We use modern encryption methods and best practices to protect your data.
faq.q6: How does the AI Assistant work?
faq.a6: AI uses a language model trained on veterinary data. It helps but does not replace a doctor.
faq.a7: You can create a reminder about vaccination, medications or food. We will send a notification one day before the event.
faq.q8: Can I delete a pet profile?
faq.a8: Yes, on the pet card there is a menu where you can select "Delete". This action is irreversible.
faq.q9: Can I add a second owner for one pet?
faq.a9: Not yet. But this feature is in development.
faq.q10: What animals is the service suitable for?
faq.a10: For cats and dogs, as well as other animals - birds, rodents, reptiles.
faq.q11: What to do if I forgot my password?
faq.a11: On the login page, click "Forgot password?" and follow the instructions.
faq.q12: Does VetCard have a mobile app?
faq.a12: Currently only web version, but mobile app is planned.
faq.a13: Edit the profile on the user page or in the pet card.
faq.a14: Basic features are free. PRO features may appear later.
faq.a15: Write to us at email in the "Contacts" section. We respond within 24 hours.
